snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index ended its worst week of the year after March unemployment figures showed the nation added the fewest jobs in nine months.
abstract: Weak data trips up Wall Street, capping the worst week of the year for the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index and dampening optimism of a sustained recovery.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index ended its worst week of the year after March unemployment figures showed the nation added the fewest jobs in nine months.

headline.main: Jobs Data Cements a Bad Week for the S.&P. 500
headline.print_headline: Jobs Data Cements a Bad Week for the S.&P. 500
